CREATE.INFO_SEED: Tap and swipe over this area.
CREATE.INFO_STEP_ONE: First, create a random seed for the generation of your passphrase.
CREATE.INFO_STEP_TWO: Now you have to memorize all 12 words of your passphrase in the right order.
CREATE.INFO_STEP_TWO_ACTION: Write down the following words separated by space and keep them secret.
CREATE.INFO_STEP_THREE: Please enter the words of your passphrase again.
CREATE.INFO_STEP_THREE_ACTION: Write down word #{{value}} and select it.
CREATE.INFO_STEP_FOUR: Please set a six-digit pin code for your account. The pin code is used to approve outgoing transactions.

IMPORT.ACTIVE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: An active account offers full functionality. You can send and receive Burstcoins. In addition, you can check your balance and see the history of your transactions.
IMPORT.ACTIVE_ACCOUNT_PIN_INFO: Please set a six-digit pin code for your account. The pin code is used to approve outgoing transactions.
IMPORT.INFO: Import an active account by entering its passphrase. Otherwise, import an offline account by entering its Burstcoin address.
IMPORT.OFFLINE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: An offline account offers the same functionality than an active account, except you cannot send Burstcoins to another address.

ACTIVATE.ENTER_PASSPHRASE: Enter the passphrase of the account {{value}} here.

ACCOUNTS.REMOVE: Do you really want to remove this account ?
ACCOUNTS.TITLE: Accounts

ABOUT.TWITTER: Follow us on twitter to get updates on our projects!

NODE.INFO: The Burst node is used to communicate with the Burst network

SUPPORT.DONATE: You like our app ? Support us by donating BURST!

START.INFO: No account created yet. Choose to import an existing account or create a new one!

NOTIFICATIONS.ADDRESS: Please enter a valid Burstcoin address!
NOTIFICATIONS.DECIMAL_AMOUNT: Please enter a decimal number for the amount of BURST you want to send!
NOTIFICATIONS.DECIMAL_FEE: Please enter a decimal number (atleast 1) as fee!
NOTIFICATIONS.EXCEED: Amount and Fee exceed your balance!
NOTIFICATIONS.PIN: Please enter a six-digit number as Pin!
NOTIFICATIONS.WRONG_PASSPHRASE: Wrong passphrase! The provided passphrase does not generate the public key assigned to your account!
NOTIFICATIONS.WRONG_PIN: The provided pin does not match the account's pin!

ERRORS.ACCOUNT_ID: Cannot generate account id from public key!
ERRORS.ADDRESS: Cannot generate BURST address from account id!
ERRORS.CONNECTION: Failed fetching data. Check your internet connection!
ERRORS.KEYPAIR: Failed to generate keypair for passphrase!
ERRORS.NO_PUBLIC_KEY: Recipient has no public key yet! Sending of encrypted message not possible!
ERRORS.REDIRECT: Cannot open send BURST page! Current account is not active!
ERRORS.UNKNOWN_ACCOUNT: Account is still unknown. No transactions yet!
